argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fveval1fvcl.q | |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | fveval1fvcl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | fveval1fvcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | fveval1fvcl.u | |- U = ( Base ` P ) |
| 5 |  | fveval1fvcl.r | |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) |
| 6 |  | fveval1fvcl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | fveval1fvcl.m | |- ( ph -> M e. U ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R ^s B ) = ( R ^s B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) = ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 8, 3 | #P_evl1rhm | |- ( R e. CRing -> O e. ( P RingHom ( R ^s B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 9 | #P_rhmf | |- ( O e. ( P RingHom ( R ^s B ) ) -> O : U --> ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 5, 13, 14 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> O : U --> ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15, 7 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( O ` M ) e. ( Base ` ( R ^s B ) ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 3, 9, 5, 12, 16 | #P_pwselbas | |- ( ph -> ( O ` M ) : B --> B ) |
| 18 | 17, 6 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ph -> ( ( O ` M ) ` Y ) e. B ) |
